Yup, the Constructicons are on the DED ship, which is following 
the Autobot ship, Hidden One. At present they are being dragged 
int-- read my last post. ;)

On 27 Jun 2001, at 0:41, Northlight wrote:

> OOC: The last time I remember seeing the Constructicons was on a ship
> almost confronting some Autobots and Hook getting shoved a bit. Since
> I've not been able to find a suitable place to slip L.H. in, I'll do
> it here. If there's any questions as to what he's been doing since
> those posts, let's just say he's been very quiet lately. *Wink* 
>     Last I remeber, the Constructicons were on a ship....Please 
> correct me if I'm wrong.
> 
> ::LONGHAUL::
> 
>     Long Haul sat in the background, absorbed in his thoughts. He was
> desperately BORED and wished for some excitement. How he wanted to be
> in battle...The future held some promise. Maybe he'd be able to do
> more than build energy installations on the sidelines.
>     Primus...all this waiting was making him restless.
>     He sighed and lifted his legs up onto the edge of the computer
> terminal, using his micro-lazer to widdle away at a lump of metal. He
> hated being a part-time warrior. He thrilled in the excitement of
> battle . He wondered what dull and boring things (despite the
> eagerness of his comrads) awaited him at his destination.
>     (I guess I'll have to wait and see) he thought.
> 
> Northlight
> Domnijoe Productions
